column2: I live in a bowl. I can swim. I have a tail. I also have fins and big eyes. What am I?
I jump when I walk and sit when I stand. What am I?
I like to stay awake at night and sleep during the day. Who am I?
I am a domestic animal living in the field. I like to eat grass and produce milk. Who am I?
I fly all night and sleep at dawn. When I do that I hang upside down. Who am I?
